            boolean harbour,
            Vector2f position,
            Faction[] factions)
        Initializes a new City with the given components.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of a specific city
        harbour - Whether or not a city has a harbour
        position - The Vector2f (position) of a specific city
        factions - What factions are allowed in a specific city

        name - The name of the city
        legions - The legions in this city
        barbarians - The barbarians in this city
        fort - whether this city has a fort in it
